text: with Amazon chime you don't have to use
a new product to schedule meetings with
Amazon chime you just use your existing
calendar app if you're using outlook on
Windows this video shows you how to
schedule Amazon chime meetings there are
two ways to start from the Amazon chime
app or from the Outlook calendar
itself let's start by launching the
Amazon chime app from the Launchpad
choose meetings and schedule a
meeting this brings up the schedule
meeting assistant confirm that Outlook
calendar is selected as the calendar
application while you're in the schedule
meeting assistant you can configure your
meeting settings this includes selecting
diin numbers for your attendees if you
have international dials available a
link is displayed here to add countries
or toll free options choose the link and
select dials to include Amazon chime
will add them to your meeting
instructions you also select either a
personal meeting ID or one-time meeting
ID the personal meeting ID was assigned
to you when you created your account use
it for internal or team
meetings this number is the same for all
meetings you schedule using Amazon chime
this makes it easier for you to remember
and share with others if you are
scheduling back-to-back meetings
overlapping or a highly confidential
meeting choose the onetime meeting ID
Amazon chime generates a special
10-digit pen that you can use for a
single meeting event or for a recurring
series let's go ahead and choose a
one-time meeting
ID your selections here dial in numbers
meeting IDs automatically populate the
schedule meeting instructions field
after you've finalized the instructions
choose schedule with Outlook the first
time you do this you'll be prompted to
install the Amazon chime for Outlook
addin if Outlook is running you'll be
prompted to shut it down follow the
installation instructions and then
restart
Outlook you can verify that the Amazon
ch addin was installed properly by
choosing calendar and ensuring that
schedule Amazon chime meeting shows on
the outload calendar
ribbon complete the process of
scheduling your meeting from within the
Amazon chime app by clicking schedule
without Outlook the first time you do
this you'll be prompted to sign in with
your Amazon chime credentials which are
the email and password you use to create
your Amazon chime
account after you're signed in an
Outlook invite pops up notice that the
two field includes the meet atchim AWS
and pin plus 10-digit onetime meeting ID
email addresses your meeting
instructions are also included in the
description the meet at chime AWS email
address enables Amazon Chimes autoc call
feature when you include this email
address Amazon chime receives the
meeting name date time and attendee
details the meeting will automatically
start for registered attendees at the
scheduled time now enter the date time
attendees and recurrence and then send
the
invite you may be one of those users who
live an Outlook so starting a meeting
invite in Amazon chime may not be your
desired flow not a problem let's look at
scheduling a meeting from your outlook
Calendar after the Amazon chime addin
has been inst installed first include
your international phone numbers if
available by choosing schedule Amazon
chime meeting dropdown on the Outlook
calendar ribbon and selecting
International dials next open up a
meeting date and time or choose
appointment or new meeting to open an
invite window from the invite ribbon
choose schedule Amazon chime meeting the
Amazon chime addin prompts you to select
the meeting ID type and then populates
the invite with meet at chime AWS and
the meeting instructions which include
the meeting link dial in information and
meeting
ID edit the meeting instructions as
needed and complete the invite choose
send to notify attendees and Amazon
chime what about adding Amazon chime to
an existing meeting on your outlook
Calendar open an existing
meeting choose schedule Amazon chime
meeting after you select the type of
meeting ID to use the meetting at chime
AWS address address is added to the two
field if you chose a one-time meeting ID
the pin plus 10-digit meeting ID is also
added the body of your existing meeting
description is populated with the Amazon
chime meeting instructions you can edit
as necessary choose save and send the
update to all so that everyone receives
the new meeting
details that's all there is to
scheduling meetings with Amazon chime
